product_name: Sawyer Glide Straight Shaft Canoe Paddle
long_description: Featuring a handsome wooden construction, the Sawyer Glide straight shaft canoe paddle offers value to fit into any paddler's budget. The Glide straight shaft canoe paddle features a classic blade shape made of laminated pine, walnut and ash wood that's perfect for calm lakes and streams. Wood is a great choice for balance, feel and performance, and it's comfortable in your hands regardless of the temperature. Tough material protects the blade tip from rocks and rough treatment. Pear grip and oval fir shaft allow hours of paddling comfort.
short_description: Featuring a handsome wooden construction, the Sawyer Glide straight shaft canoe paddle offers value to fit into any paddler's budget.
